Please go to the Daffodil Student Affairs(DSA) office and collect the printed laptop application form. 
 
 
DSA Office Address: 
Office of the Director of Student's Affairs(DSA Office) 
Level-4, Daffodil Tower-5 
4/2, Sobhanbagh, Mirpur Road 
Dhaka-1207

You do not have DSA Office Clearance. 
 
 
Please go to DSA Office and do the registration by pay 500 tk and get DSA Office clearance. 
 
Note : DSA Office Collect that 500 tk for training purpose. 
 
 
DSA Office Address: 
Office of the Director of Student's Affairs(DSA Office) 
Level-4, Daffodil Tower-5 
4/2, Sobhanbagh, Mirpur Road 
Dhaka-1207

I, do hereby swear that, the laptop that I have received from Daffodil International University (DIU) will be used for building my future career, and serving the society and the nation productively as per expectation of DIU. I will never use it for offensive or subversive activities, which will be harmful to me and my family, my university, society and the nation. I also assure that, if I fail to maintain my oath in future, I will be bound to return the laptop or accept any decision imposed on me by DIU authority.
